properties.name: easyeventbus.async-enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable async event processing

properties.name: easyeventbus.async-thread-pool-size
properties.description: Thread pool size for async event processing

properties.name: easyeventbus.enable
properties.description: Flag to enable or disable EasyEventBus

properties.name: easyeventbus.identifier
properties.description: The identifier for the default EventBus

properties.name: easyeventbus.max-subscribers-per-event
properties.description: Maximum number of subscribers per event type (for performance tuning)
